build: sh -c '$(dfx cache show)/moc src/hashmap.mo -o hashmap.wasm --public-metadata candid:service --package base $(dfx cache show)/base'
sh -c '$(dfx cache show)/moc src/triemap.mo -o triemap.wasm --public-metadata candid:service --package base $(dfx cache show)/base'
sh -c '$(dfx cache show)/moc src/rbtree.mo -o rbtree.wasm --public-metadata candid:service --package base $(dfx cache show)/base'
sh -c '$(dfx cache show)/moc src/heap.mo -o heap.wasm --public-metadata candid:service --package base $(dfx cache show)/base'
